title: Permanent TSB Group (LON:PTSB) Hits New 1-Year High - Here's What Happened
text:
Permanent TSB Group (LON:PTSB) Hits New 1-Year High - Here's What Happened Written by MarketBeat September 3, 2025 Share Link copied to clipboard. Key Points Permanent TSB Group's stock reached a new 52-week high, trading at GBX 2.34 ($0.03) during Monday's session. The company's market cap is approximately £11.99 million with a price-to-earnings ratio of 16.92. Permanent TSB Group operates primarily in retail and SME banking sectors in the Republic of Ireland, offering various banking services. MarketBeat previews top five stocks to own in October . Get Permanent TSB Group alerts: Sign Up Permanent TSB Group Holdings plc ( LON:PTSB - Get Free Report )'s stock price hit a new 52-week high during trading on Monday . The company traded as high as GBX 2.34 ($0.03) and last traded at GBX 2.20 ($0.03), with a volume of 27506 shares changing hands. The stock had previously closed at GBX 2.30 ($0.03). Permanent TSB Group Price Performance
The stock has a market cap of £11.99 million, a price-to-earnings ratio of 16.92 and a beta of 0.98. The stock's 50-day moving average is GBX 2.14 and its 200 day moving average is GBX 1.80. Permanent TSB Group Company Profile ( Get Free Report )
Permanent TSB Group Holdings plc operates in the retail, and small and medium sized enterprises (SME) banking sectors in the Republic of Ireland. It provides transactional banking, lending, saving, and deposit taking services. The company offers its products and services through branch network, brokers, direct, digital and SME channel.
